00025 // 2D Regions for arrays and matrices
00026 
00027 #ifndef REGION2D_H
00028 #define REGION2D_H
00029 
00030 #include "tnt/index.h"
00031 #include <iostream>
00032 #include <cassert>
00033 
00034 namespace TNT
00035 {
00036 
00037 template <class Array2D>
00038 class const_Region2D;
00039 
00040 
00041 template <class Array2D>
00042 class Region2D
00043 {
00044     protected:
00045 
00046         Array2D &  A_;
00047         Subscript offset_[2];       // 0-offset internally
00048         Subscript dim_[2];
00049 
00050     public:
00051         typedef typename Array2D::value_type T;
00052         typedef Subscript   size_type;
00053         typedef         T   value_type;
00054         typedef         T   element_type;
00055         typedef         T*  pointer;
00056         typedef         T*  iterator;
00057         typedef         T&  reference;
00058         typedef const   T*  const_iterator;
00059         typedef const   T&  const_reference;
00060 
00061         Array2D & array() { return A_; }
00062         const Array2D & array()  const { return A_; }
00063         Subscript lbound() const { return A_.lbound(); }
00064         Subscript num_rows() const { return dim_[0]; }
00065         Subscript num_cols() const { return dim_[1]; }
00066         Subscript offset(Subscript i) const                 // 1-offset
00067         {
00068 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00069             assert( A_.lbound() <= i);
00070             assert( i<= dim_[0] + A_.lbound()-1);
00071 #endif
00072             return offset_[i-A_.lbound()];
00073         }
00074 
00075         Subscript dim(Subscript i) const
00076         {
00077 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00078             assert( A_.lbound() <= i);
00079             assert( i<= dim_[0] + A_.lbound()-1);
00080 #endif
00081             return dim_[i-A_.lbound()];
00082         }
00083 
00084 
00085 
00086         Region2D(Array2D &A, Subscript i1, Subscript i2, Subscript j1,
00087                 Subscript j2) : A_(A)
00088         {
00089 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00090             assert( i1 <= i2 );
00091             assert( j1 <= j2);
00092             assert( A.lbound() <= i1);
00093             assert( i2<= A.dim(A.lbound()) + A.lbound()-1);
00094             assert( A.lbound() <= j1);
00095             assert( j2<= A.dim(A.lbound()+1) + A.lbound()-1 );
00096 #endif
00097 
00098 
00099             offset_[0] = i1-A.lbound();
00100             offset_[1] = j1-A.lbound();
00101             dim_[0] = i2-i1+1;
00102             dim_[1] = j2-j1+1;
00103         }
00104 
00105         Region2D(Array2D &A, const Index1D &I, const Index1D &J) : A_(A)
00106         {
00107 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00108             assert( I.lbound() <= I.ubound() );
00109             assert( J.lbound() <= J.ubound() );
00110             assert( A.lbound() <= I.lbound());
00111             assert( I.ubound()<= A.dim(A.lbound()) + A.lbound()-1);
00112             assert( A.lbound() <= J.lbound());
00113             assert( J.ubound() <= A.dim(A.lbound()+1) + A.lbound()-1 );
00114 #endif
00115 
00116             offset_[0] = I.lbound()-A.lbound();
00117             offset_[1] = J.lbound()-A.lbound();
00118             dim_[0] = I.ubound() - I.lbound() + 1;
00119             dim_[1] = J.ubound() - J.lbound() + 1;
00120         }
00121 
00122         Region2D(Region2D<Array2D> &A, Subscript i1, Subscript i2,
00123             Subscript j1, Subscript j2) : A_(A.A_)
00124         {
00125 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00126             assert( i1 <= i2 );
00127             assert( j1 <= j2);
00128             assert( A.lbound() <= i1);
00129             assert( i2<= A.dim(A.lbound()) + A.lbound()-1);
00130             assert( A.lbound() <= j1);
00131             assert( j2<= A.dim(A.lbound()+1) + A.lbound()-1 );
00132 #endif
00133             offset_[0] = (i1 - A.lbound()) + A.offset_[0];
00134             offset_[1] = (j1 - A.lbound()) + A.offset_[1];
00135             dim_[0] = i2-i1 + 1;
00136             dim_[1] = j2-j1+1;
00137         }
00138 
00139         Region2D<Array2D> operator()(Subscript i1, Subscript i2,
00140                 Subscript j1, Subscript j2)
00141         {
00142 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00143             assert( i1 <= i2 );
00144             assert( j1 <= j2);
00145             assert( A_.lbound() <= i1);
00146             assert( i2<= dim_[0] + A_.lbound()-1);
00147             assert( A_.lbound() <= j1);
00148             assert( j2<= dim_[1] + A_.lbound()-1 );
00149 #endif
00150             return Region2D<Array2D>(A_, 
00151                     i1+offset_[0], offset_[0] + i2, 
00152                     j1+offset_[1], offset_[1] + j2);
00153         }
00154 
00155 
00156         Region2D<Array2D> operator()(const Index1D &I,
00157                 const Index1D &J)
00158         {
00159 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00160             assert( I.lbound() <= I.ubound() );
00161             assert( J.lbound() <= J.ubound() );
00162             assert( A_.lbound() <= I.lbound());
00163             assert( I.ubound()<= dim_[0] + A_.lbound()-1);
00164             assert( A_.lbound() <= J.lbound());
00165             assert( J.ubound() <= dim_[1] + A_.lbound()-1 );
00166 #endif
00167 
00168             return Region2D<Array2D>(A_, I.lbound()+offset_[0],
00169                 offset_[0] + I.ubound(), offset_[1]+J.lbound(),
00170                 offset_[1] + J.ubound());
00171         }
00172 
00173         inline T & operator()(Subscript i, Subscript j)
00174         {
00175 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00176             assert( A_.lbound() <= i);
00177             assert( i<= dim_[0] + A_.lbound()-1);
00178             assert( A_.lbound() <= j);
00179             assert( j<= dim_[1] + A_.lbound()-1 );
00180 #endif
00181             return A_(i+offset_[0], j+offset_[1]);
00182         }
00183 
00184         inline const T & operator() (Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00185         {
00186 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00187             assert( A_.lbound() <= i);
00188             assert( i<= dim_[0] + A_.lbound()-1);
00189             assert( A_.lbound() <= j);
00190             assert( j<= dim_[1] + A_.lbound()-1 );
00191 #endif
00192             return A_(i+offset_[0], j+offset_[1]);
00193         }
00194 
00195 
00196         Region2D<Array2D> & operator=(const Region2D<Array2D> &R)
00197         {
00198             Subscript M = num_rows(); 
00199             Subscript N = num_cols();
00200 
00201             // make sure both sides conform
00202             assert(M == R.num_rows());
00203             assert(N == R.num_cols());
00204 
00205 
00206             Subscript start = R.lbound();
00207             Subscript Mend =  start + M - 1;
00208             Subscript Nend =  start + N - 1;
00209             for (Subscript i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00210               for (Subscript j=start; j<=Nend; j++)
00211                 (*this)(i,j) = R(i,j);
00212 
00213             return *this;
00214         }
00215 
00216         Region2D<Array2D> & operator=(const const_Region2D<Array2D> &R)
00217         {
00218             Subscript M = num_rows(); 
00219             Subscript N = num_cols();
00220 
00221             // make sure both sides conform
00222             assert(M == R.num_rows());
00223             assert(N == R.num_cols());
00224 
00225 
00226             Subscript start = R.lbound();
00227             Subscript Mend =  start + M - 1;
00228             Subscript Nend =  start + N - 1;
00229             for (Subscript i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00230               for (Subscript j=start; j<=Nend; j++)
00231                 (*this)(i,j) = R(i,j);
00232 
00233             return *this;
00234         }
00235 
00236         Region2D<Array2D> & operator=(const Array2D &R)
00237         {
00238             Subscript M = num_rows(); 
00239             Subscript N = num_cols();
00240 
00241             // make sure both sides conform
00242             assert(M == R.num_rows());
00243             assert(N == R.num_cols());
00244 
00245 
00246             Subscript start = R.lbound();
00247             Subscript Mend =  start + M - 1;
00248             Subscript Nend =  start + N - 1;
00249             for (Subscript i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00250               for (Subscript j=start; j<=Nend; j++)
00251                 (*this)(i,j) = R(i,j);
00252 
00253             return *this;
00254         }
00255 
00256         Region2D<Array2D> & operator=(const  T &scalar)
00257         {
00258             Subscript start = lbound();
00259             Subscript Mend = lbound() + num_rows() - 1;
00260             Subscript Nend = lbound() + num_cols() - 1;
00261 
00262 
00263             for (Subscript i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00264               for (Subscript j=start; j<=Nend; j++)
00265                 (*this)(i,j) = scalar;
00266 
00267             return *this;
00268         }
00269 
00270 };

00273 
00274 template <class Array2D>
00275 class const_Region2D
00276 {
00277     protected:
00278 
00279         const Array2D &  A_;
00280         Subscript offset_[2];       // 0-offset internally
00281         Subscript dim_[2];
00282 
00283     public:
00284     typedef typename Array2D::value_type T;
00285         typedef         T   value_type;
00286         typedef         T   element_type;
00287         typedef const   T*  const_iterator;
00288         typedef const   T&  const_reference;
00289 
00290         const Array2D & array() const { return A_; }
00291         Subscript lbound() const { return A_.lbound(); }
00292         Subscript num_rows() const { return dim_[0]; }
00293         Subscript num_cols() const { return dim_[1]; }
00294         Subscript offset(Subscript i) const                 // 1-offset
00295         {
00296 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00297             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i);
00298             assert( i<= dim_[0] + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1);
00299 #endif
00300             return offset_[i-TNT_BASE_OFFSET];
00301         }
00302 
00303         Subscript dim(Subscript i) const
00304         {
00305 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00306             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i);
00307             assert( i<= dim_[0] + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1);
00308 #endif
00309             return dim_[i-TNT_BASE_OFFSET];
00310         }
00311 
00312 
00313         const_Region2D(const Array2D &A, Subscript i1, Subscript i2, 
00314                 Subscript j1, Subscript j2) : A_(A)
00315         {
00316 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00317             assert( i1 <= i2 );
00318             assert( j1 <= j2);
00319             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i1);
00320             assert( i2<= A.dim(TNT_BASE_OFFSET) + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1);
00321             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= j1);
00322             assert( j2<= A.dim(TNT_BASE_OFFSET+1) + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1 );
00323 #endif
00324 
00325             offset_[0] = i1-TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00326             offset_[1] = j1-TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00327             dim_[0] = i2-i1+1;
00328             dim_[1] = j2-j1+1;
00329         }
00330 
00331         const_Region2D(const Array2D &A, const Index1D &I, const Index1D &J) 
00332                 : A_(A)
00333         {
00334 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00335             assert( I.lbound() <= I.ubound() );
00336             assert( J.lbound() <= J.ubound() );
00337             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= I.lbound());
00338             assert( I.ubound()<= A.dim(TNT_BASE_OFFSET) + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1);
00339             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= J.lbound());
00340             assert( J.ubound() <= A.dim(TNT_BASE_OFFSET+1) + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1 );
00341 #endif
00342 
00343             offset_[0] = I.lbound()-TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00344             offset_[1] = J.lbound()-TNT_BASE_OFFSET;
00345             dim_[0] = I.ubound() - I.lbound() + 1;
00346             dim_[1] = J.ubound() - J.lbound() + 1;
00347         }
00348 
00349 
00350         const_Region2D(const_Region2D<Array2D> &A, Subscript i1, 
00351                 Subscript i2,
00352             Subscript j1, Subscript j2) : A_(A.A_)
00353         {
00354 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00355             assert( i1 <= i2 );
00356             assert( j1 <= j2);
00357             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i1);
00358             assert( i2<= A.dim(TNT_BASE_OFFSET) + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1);
00359             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= j1);
00360             assert( j2<= A.dim(TNT_BASE_OFFSET+1) + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1 );
00361 #endif
00362             offset_[0] = (i1 - TNT_BASE_OFFSET) + A.offset_[0];
00363             offset_[1] = (j1 - TNT_BASE_OFFSET) + A.offset_[1];
00364             dim_[0] = i2-i1 + 1;
00365             dim_[1] = j2-j1+1;
00366         }
00367 
00368         const_Region2D<Array2D> operator()(Subscript i1, Subscript i2,
00369                 Subscript j1, Subscript j2)
00370         {
00371 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00372             assert( i1 <= i2 );
00373             assert( j1 <= j2);
00374             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i1);
00375             assert( i2<= dim_[0] + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1);
00376             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= j1);
00377             assert( j2<= dim_[0] + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1 );
00378 #endif
00379             return const_Region2D<Array2D>(A_, 
00380                     i1+offset_[0], offset_[0] + i2, 
00381                     j1+offset_[1], offset_[1] + j2);
00382         }
00383 
00384 
00385         const_Region2D<Array2D> operator()(const Index1D &I,
00386                 const Index1D &J)
00387         {
00388 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00389             assert( I.lbound() <= I.ubound() );
00390             assert( J.lbound() <= J.ubound() );
00391             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= I.lbound());
00392             assert( I.ubound()<= dim_[0] + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1);
00393             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= J.lbound());
00394             assert( J.ubound() <= dim_[1] + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1 );
00395 #endif
00396 
00397             return const_Region2D<Array2D>(A_, I.lbound()+offset_[0],
00398                 offset_[0] + I.ubound(), offset_[1]+J.lbound(),
00399                 offset_[1] + J.ubound());
00400         }
00401 
00402 
00403         inline const T & operator() (Subscript i, Subscript j) const
00404         {
00405 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00406             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= i);
00407             assert( i<= dim_[0] + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1);
00408             assert( TNT_BASE_OFFSET <= j);
00409             assert( j<= dim_[1] + TNT_BASE_OFFSET-1 );
00410 #endif
00411             return A_(i+offset_[0], j+offset_[1]);
00412         }
00413 
00414 };

00417 //  ************** std::ostream algorithms *******************************
00418 
00419 template <class Array2D>
00420 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const const_Region2D<Array2D> &A)
00421 {
00422     Subscript start = A.lbound();
00423     Subscript Mend=A.lbound()+ A.num_rows() - 1;
00424     Subscript Nend=A.lbound() + A.num_cols() - 1;
00425 
00426 
00427     s << A.num_rows() << "  " << A.num_cols() << "\n";
00428     for (Subscript i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00429     {
00430         for (Subscript j=start; j<=Nend; j++)
00431         {
00432             s << A(i,j) << " ";
00433         }
00434         s << "\n";
00435     }
00436 
00437 
00438     return s;
00439 }
00440 
00441 template <class Array2D>
00442 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const Region2D<Array2D> &A)
00443 {
00444     Subscript start = A.lbound();
00445     Subscript Mend=A.lbound()+ A.num_rows() - 1;
00446     Subscript Nend=A.lbound() + A.num_cols() - 1;
00447 
00448 
00449     s << A.num_rows() << "  " << A.num_cols() << "\n";
00450     for (Subscript i=start; i<=Mend; i++)
00451     {
00452         for (Subscript j=start; j<=Nend; j++)
00453         {
00454             s << A(i,j) << " ";
00455         }
00456         s << "\n";
00457     }
00458 
00459 
00460     return s;
00461 
00462 }
